# INOutgoingMessageTypeResolutionResult

**Class**

A resolution result for the message’s format.

## Declaration

```swift
class INOutgoingMessageTypeResolutionResult
```

## Overview

Return an [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INOutgoingMessageTypeResolutionResult] when you resolve an [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INOutgoingMessageType] parameter. Use the creation method that best reflects your ability to successfully resolve the parameter.

For additional resolution options, see [doc://com.apple.sirikit/documentation/Intents/INIntentResolutionResult].

## Creating a Resolution Result

- **success(with:)**: Creates an object with a resolution that involves the successful matching of the specified parameter.
- **confirmationRequired(with:)**: Creates an object with a resolution that requires the user to confirm the value before proceeding.

## Providing Resolution Results

- **INMessageAttributeResolutionResult**: A resolution result for assorted attributes of a message.
- **INMessageAttributeOptionsResolutionResult**: A resolution result for a search parameter that filters by message status.
- **INDateComponentsRangeResolutionResult**: A resolution result for a range of dates in a parameter of an intent.
- **INSendMessageRecipientResolutionResult**: A resolution result for the recipient of a message.
- **INPersonResolutionResult**: A resolution result for a user as a parameter of an intent.

## Inherits From

- INIntentResolutionResult

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSObjectProtocol
